---
title: "posit::conf(2025) workshops"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
workshops <- read_csv("data/workshops-2025.csv")
workshop_instructors <- read_csv("data/workshop-instructors-2025.csv")
workshop_info <- workshops |>
  left_join(
    workshop_instructors |>
      filter(role == "Instructor") |>
      select(workshop, name),
    by = join_by(title == workshop)
  ) |>
  group_by(title) |>
  summarize(
    url = unique(url),
    instructor = paste(name, collapse = ", "),
  ) |>
  mutate(workshop = paste0("[", title, "](", url, ")")) |>
  select(workshop, instructor)
gt(workshop_info) |>
  fmt_markdown(columns = workshop) |>
  cols_label(
    workshop = "Workshop",
    instructor = "Instructor(s)"
  )
```
